body:
Post a funny moment on MC, IRL, or in any other game you think others might enjoy. 

I'll start it off with this: https://i.gyazo.com/thumb/200/_0901e071724dab0343081786c1fc4a4a.png 
(Was uploading vid mid-fight) 

An IRL one was when someone in my Grade was playing Soccer/Football and he jumped for the ball and my friend yelled his clash of clans username, nargon (idek) in a weird voice and made him miss the ball.

title: Funny Moments
